title: The CEO of One: How to Lead an AI Workforce (Before Your Boss Does)
description: The real threat isn't AI replacing you—it's becoming the person who doesn't use AI while someone younger and hungrier builds an army of digital interns.
content: I keep thinking about my niece. Finance grad student, 23, perpetually sleep-deprived in that specific way only grad students and new parents achieve. Last month...

title: Everything You Know About AI Is Already Obsolete
description: The uncomfortable truth - if you are just using AI to do tasks, you are competing on price against a machine that costs pennies to run. You will lose.
content: I've been staring at retention graphs and script structures for years, trying to figure out why some creators explode and others fade away. Lately, I've noticed...

title: The Sovereign Brain - Why the Future of AI Must Be Local
description: If we want AI to truly augment human potential, we have to break the tether to the cloud. We need to run these models locally, on our own devices.

title: We Shape Our Tools, and Thereafter Our Tools Shape Us
description: Every time an AI agent moves a file for you or edits your config, you're not just skipping the boring work. You're skipping the comprehension.
